Room.Name: Uland Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Uland Way, just west of the intersection with Rum Road.
Room.LongDescription: A number of small shops line the twisting street, catering mostly to the people who live here on the island. Immediately to the north is a dirty llittle fish market, which gives the street a pleasant smell. Shopkeepers lounge in their doorways and eye you as you stroll along. Uland Way seems to twist out of sight to the west.
